content.body:
> <@seirdy:seirdy.one> Besides search engines, what are some known working applications of microdata (and other related formats)? I've seen article extraction implementations (including DOM Distiller, Trafilatura) make use of it, for instance.

interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the HTML markup. Knowing some working applications could help me.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @seirdy:seirdy.one
Besides search engines, what are some known working applications of microdata (and other related formats)? I've seen article extraction implementations (including DOM Distiller, Trafilatura) make use of it, for instance.
interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the HTML markup. Knowing some working applications could help me.

content.body: * interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the same HTML. Knowing some working applications could help me.

m.new_content.body: interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the same HTML. Knowing some working applications could help me.

content.body: Can microdata use namespaces intended for RDFa like Dublin Core, FOAF, and Creative Commons?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Can microdata use namespaces intended for RDFa like Dublin Core, FOAF, and Creative Commons?

content.body: * interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the same HTML. Knowing some working applications for consuming (rather than creating) microdata (or other semantic markup syntaxes) could help me.
content.formatted_body: * interested in using microdata as an alternative to e.g. a REST API for a website, providing all the data structured in the same HTML. Knowing some working applications for consuming (rather than creating) microdata (or other semantic markup syntaxes) could help me.
